text: Wigberto "Ka Bobby" Ebarle Tañada Sr. (born August 13, 1934) is a Filipino politician. He is member of the Liberal Party and a former member of the Senate of the Philippines (1987–1995) and Philippine House of Representatives representing the Quezon's 4th District (1995–2001). ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Minority leaders of the Senate of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Quezon City
title: Wigberto Tañada
